auto_logout_dialog_description: We've noticed you've been inactive for a while. Let us know if you're still there, otherwise we will close your League Client.
rp_change_info: RP has a new look! Use it the same as before.
ready_check_dodge_warning_notification: You have declined too many games in a row. Be sure that you're ready to play before you enter the queue or you may face a penalty.
ready_check_dodge_penalty_notification: You have declined too many games in a row and are temporarily unable to join queues.
ready_check_reject_party_notification: {{summonerName}} has declined ready check. You have been returned to the lobby.
ready_check_reject_stranger_notification: A player has declined ready check. You have been returned to the queue.
ready_check_unexpected_error_message: An unexpected error has occurred while displaying Ready Check.
migration_needed_content: League of Legends will now update your desktop shortcuts. Your operating system may ask for Administrator permissions.
migration_failed_content: Unfortunately, there was an error updating your shortcuts for you. Click on HELP below to get more information about this error.
login_error_PLATFORM_SHUT_DOWN_WARNING: PVP.Net will be shutting down in 5 minutes for maintenance.
login_error_PLATFORM_SHUT_DOWN: PVP.Net has shutdown. The client will be closed.
login_error_LEAGUE_TOKEN_EXPIRED$html: Your session has expired.  Please log in again to continue.
login_error_LOGGED_IN_ELSEWHERE$html:
Your account has been logged in to from another computer or device. If this was unauthorized please visit the player support site at:

https://support.riotgames.com
lcu_alpha_disabled_message: The League Client has been disabled for maintenance and must now close.
lcu_alpha_disabled_warning_message: The League Client has been disabled for maintenance and will soon close.
platform_maintenance_message: The PVP.Net server has shut down for maintenance and the client must now close.
platform_maintenance_warning_message: The PVP.Net server has shut down for maintenance and the client will soon close.
shutdown_apology: We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
game_launch_failed_message: League of Legends has failed to launch
lol_content_targeting_modal_body_text: We’ve upgraded your client to show you news articles relevant to your country. This change won’t affect your current in-game or client language and you can revert anytime by visiting general settings
honor_late_recognition_team_choice_heade: You were the most honorable player from your previous game
honor_late_recognition_header_plural: Here are your honors from the previous game
honor_late_recognition_header: Here's your honor from the previous game
honor_celebration_unlock_0_body: You can finally level up in Honor again. Be careful, you’ll be back here pretty fast with dishonorable behavior.
honor_celebration_unlock_1_body: You can unlock loot and Honor rewards again. Stay cool.
honor_celebration_levelup_3_body: Play well, play nice, and play fair to maintain your good standing.
honor_celebration_levelup_3_recall_body: Congratulations! You've reached Honor Level 3. You can now earn loading screen flairs and an honor recall.
honor_celebration_levelup_4_body: You're consistently positive, respectful, and collaborate effectively with your team.
honor_celebration_levelup_5_body: You represent a rare class of players who make games fun.
honor_celebration_levelup_5_body_sub: Thank you for fostering a welcoming and supportive environment. <3
honor_celebration_season_reward_capsule_: You've been awarded the end-of-season capsule for reaching Honor Level {{honorLevel}}. Thank you for being honorable!
honor_celebration_levelup_5_reward_body: Congratulations! You’ve unlocked an Honor 5 Capsule for your efforts.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_1_body: You're on your way back to honorable standing.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_2_body: You made it back to level 2. You're on your way to more loot and better rewards.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_2_clas: You made it back to level 2. You can now unlock better rewards and play Clash!
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_3_body: You're back to level 3! You can earn loading screen flairs again.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_3_reca: You're back to level 3! You can earn loading screen flairs and an honor recall again.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_4_body: Welcome back to level 4! Your flair got an upgrade and so did your rewards!
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_5_body: You're back to the highest honor level
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_3_rewa: Looks like you already unlocked your level 3 Capsule. Here's an Orb instead.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_4_rewa: Looks like you already unlocked your level 4 Capsule. Here's an Orb instead.
honor_celebration_levelup_reclimb_5_rewa: Looks like you already unlocked your level 5 Capsule. Here's an Orb instead.
honor_celebration_checkpoint_body: You've reached checkpoint {{honorCheckpoint}} of 3 in Honor level {{honorLevel}}.
honor_celebration_checkpoint_body_last: You've reached the last checkpoint before Honor level {{nextLevel}}.
honor_celebration_checkpoint_reclimb_low: You're on the right track, keep it up!
honor_celebration_checkpoint_reclimb_bod: You're improving. Keep fighting with honor!
honor_celebration_periodic_reward_body: Playing honorably in every game levels you up, regardless of getting honored by teammates. GG <3
honor_celebration_recall_reward_body: The Honor Recall animation has been enabled! It will stay enabled for the rest of the season as long as you maintain Honor Level 5.
honor_celebration_recall_reward_reclimb_: The Honor Level 5 Recall animation has been re-enabled for the rest of the season as long as you maintain Honor Level 5.
honor_celebration_season_reward_skin_tex: You have unlocked Three Honors Malzahar for reaching Honor Level 5. Thank you for being honorable!
honor_reward_stat_recent_cool: Your teammates like your tilt-proof attitude. {{value}} of your recent honors are for staying cool.
honor_reward_stat_recent_shotcaller: Your strategic style helps your team. {{value}} of your recent honors are for great calls.
honor_reward_stat_recent_heart: You make games better for your teammates. {{value}} of your recent honors are GG <3.
honor_reward_stat_percent_recent_cool: Your teammates noticed your tilt-proof approach. {{value}}% of your recent honors are for staying cool.
honor_reward_stat_percent_recent_shotcal: Your teammates noticed your strategic style. {{value}}% of your recent honors are for great calls.
honor_reward_stat_percent_recent_heart: Teammates like having you on their side. {{value}}% of your recent honors are GG <3.
honor_reward_stat_percent_seasonal_cool: This season, {{value}}% of your honors are for staying cool.
honor_reward_stat_percent_seasonal_shotc: This season, {{value}}% of your honors are for great calls.
honor_reward_stat_percent_seasonal_heart: This season, {{value}}% of your honors are GG <3.
honor_reward_stat_compare_cool: You've gotten {{value}}% more honors for staying cool than the average player. Keep it up!
honor_reward_stat_compare_shotcaller: You've gotten {{value}}% more honors for great calls than the average player. Nice job!
honor_reward_stat_compare_heart: You've gotten {{value}}% more honors for GG<3 than the average player. Nice work!
honor_reward_stat_stranger_sent[zero]: Your teammates appreciate the credit. You gave {{value}} honors to non-premades in recent games.
honor_reward_stat_stranger_sent[one]: Your teammates appreciate the credit. You gave {{value}} honor to non-premades in recent games.
honor_reward_stat_stranger_sent[few]: Your teammates appreciate the credit. You gave {{value}} honors to non-premades in recent games.
honor_reward_stat_stranger_sent[other]: Your teammates appreciate the credit. You gave {{value}} honors to non-premades in recent games.
honor_reward_stat_stranger_received: Teammates like having you on their side. {{value}} of your honors are from non-premades in recent games.
honor_reward_stat_stranger_mutual[zero]: You exchanged {{value}} honors with non-premades in recent games. Keep fighting with honor!
honor_reward_stat_stranger_mutual[one]: You exchanged {{value}} honor with non-premades in recent games. Keep fighting with honor!
honor_reward_stat_stranger_mutual[few]: You exchanged {{value}} honors with non-premades in recent games. Keep fighting with honor!
honor_reward_stat_stranger_mutual[other]: You exchanged {{value}} honors with non-premades in recent games. Keep fighting with honor!
honor_demotion_description$html:
Your Honor level has dropped to {{newHonorLevel}}.

You can raise it again by coordinating with teammates or receiving honor votes.
honor_demotion_warning_description:
Your honor is dipping a bit. 

Continue to coordinate with your teammates and receive honor votes to maintain your current level.
honor_redemption_complete_description: You're no longer honor restricted and your level reflects your recent behavior.
login_error_alpha_unavailable: The alpha test is currently unavailable.
login_error_FAILED_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_L: Unable to connect to the login queue. The platform may be down for maintenance. Check the server status here If it looks good, follow the guide here
login_error_IP_BLOCKED_FROM_LOGIN_QUEUE: Unable to connect to the login queue, your connection is not allowed.
login_error_FAILED_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_R: Unable to connect to the authentication service. Check the server status here If it looks good, follow the guide here
login_error_GEN-0001: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server. Check the server status here If it looks good, follow the guide here
login_error_GEN-0002: The request to the PVP.net server timed out. Please try again, or check the server status here
login_error_GEN-0003: Connection error. Check the server status here If everything looks good, troubleshooting steps can be found here
login_error_GEN-0004: An unexpected error has occurred. Check the server status here If everything looks good, troubleshooting steps can be found here
login_error_ACCOUNT_DISABLED: This account is currently disabled. Please contact Player Support for account recovery here.
login_error_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password, click here
login_error_MISSING_ENTITLEMENTS: You have not yet acquired eligibility for this region, please visit the official website to apply.
login_error_INVALID_MFA_CODE: The code you entered is invalid. Please try again.
login_error_LCU-0001: You have not been approved for the alpha test
login_error_LOGIN_CANCELED: Your login attempt has been cancelled
login_error_LOGIN_QUEUE_BUSY: The login queue is experiencing heavy traffic. The platform may be down for maintenance. Try again later or check the server status here
login_error_LOGIN-0001: Your League of Legends client version is out of sync with the server. This usually means the patching process did not complete properly. Please follow the steps to force a re-patch here
login_error_LOGIN-0002: The Player Support Team is currently reviewing your account. You will be able to log into your account shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
login_error_LOGIN-0006: Username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password, click here
login_error_LOGIN-0007: The server is currently busy. Try again later or check the server status here
login_error_LOGIN-0008: Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, contact Player Support.
login_error_LOGIN-0009: Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes. If the issue persists, contact Player Support.
login_error_LOGIN-0010: Your account has been transferred to a different region.
login_error_LOGIN-0011: Large amounts of failed login attempts triggered a temporary lock on your account. Please try again later, and immediately reset your password if the attempts were unauthorized.
login_error_LOGIN-0012: Because shutdown law is now in effect, you are currently unable to log in.
login_error_LOGIN-0013: Your operating system is not supported by League of Legends. Minimum system requirements can be found here
login_error_LOGIN-0014: Access to the Mac beta is currently limited to registered users.
login_error_LOGIN-0016: According to the play schedule set by you or your parent, you cannot play at this time. Click here to check your play schedule.
login_error_LOGIN-0017: The Game Industry Promotion Act requires users under the age of 18 to obtain approval by a legal representative to play the game. Click here for the legal representative agreement.
login_error_LOGIN-0025: By your request, your account has been locked. You can still login to the website. To unlock your account visit here
login_error_LOGIN-0026: There was an error accessing your account. We could not locate your account on the server. Please attempt to login again. If the issue persists, reach out to Player Support for assistance.
login_error_NO_ALPHA_ENTITLEMENT: Your account does not yet have access to the alpha test.
login_error_PLATFORM_DOWN: League of Legends is currently down for maintenance. Please check the server status page and try again later.
login_error_RATE_LIMITED: You have tried logging in too many times in a short period of time. Please wait a while before retrying.
login_error_CONSENT_REQUIRED: You need your parent's permission to log in to your account. Please visit the parental permission page to unlock your account.
login_error_unknown: An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com
login_error_UNSPECIFIED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com
login_error_dev_autologin_failure: Something’s gone wrong. Log in to solve the problem
login_error_authorization_revoked: You’ve lost connection to our services, please restart the client to fix the issue. If this issue persists, please contact player support.
login_error_SUMMONER_MISSING: Your summoner details could not be found. Please check for any new updates. If this issue persists, please contact player support.
login_error_SUMMONER_FAILURE: Failed to fetch your summoner details. Please try again, or check the server status here
login_session_error_auto_login: There was an unexpected error with the login session. Please try again.
login_error_FAILED_TO_COMMUNICATE_WITH_S: Unable to connect to the session service. Check the server status here. If it looks good, follow the guide here
Failed to receive Platform SIPT. Check the server status here.
worlds_tooltip_description: Claim your earned Worlds Tokens by purchasing the Worlds Pass!
navbar_tooltip_tft_hub_disabled: The TFT Pass will be back soon. Until then, click Play in the upper-left corner to create a lobby.
notifications_store_gift_mystery_details: {{sender}} has summoned you a mystery gift
notifications_error_details: An unexpected error occured. Error Code: {{errorCode}}
tft_star_fragments_increase_notification: You can use Star Shards to upgrade Tacticians to a higher tier!
crash_report_modal_subtitle: League of Legends experienced a crash, would you like to automatically upload crash reports?
client_game_32_bit_deprecation_title: Support for 32-bit Windows OS will be deprecated on {{date}}
client_game_32_bit_deprecation_body:
After this date a 64-bit version of Windows will be required to play League of Legends. For more details, please see our min spec requirements.

Why is Riot doing this?

As with other difficult decisions we've made in the past like deprecating XP and Vista, continuing to release new content while maintaining older hardware requires significant investment both from a development and a testing standpoint. By removing some of these barriers, we can continue to push the boundaries of new features while delivering engaging player experiences.
tft_pass_autoclaim_text: Check out the event pass to see what you've earned!
tft_loot_deprecation_modal_pre_subtitle: For more information check out the
tft_loot_deprecation_modal_pre_body: We're parting ways with Loot Eggs during patch TFT13.7. Your remaining Eggs will be opened for you automatically and their contents added to your inventory.  In cases where you owned everything the Eggs had to offer, 50 Treasure Tokens have been added to your account for each Egg opened.
tft_loot_deprecation_modal_post_body: If you had leftover eggs in your inventory, they've been opened for you, and their contents have been automatically added to your inventory. In cases where you owned everything the Eggs had to offer, 50 Treasure Tokens have been added to your account for each egg opened.
tft_cont_retier_modal_post_body: With TFT 14.5, we've changed how cosmetic content is categorized and displayed. You'll see new gems and iconography that reflect this updated rarity and content categorization. As a result of these changes, we've updated the tiers of some content to better fit the new system. Additionally, we've changed Treasure Realm Drop Tables and Star Shard pricing to align with the updated tiers. For more info, check out our article.
snrd_transition_modal_body_preLaunch$htm: In {{daysRemaining}} day(s) League of Legends will transition from using Summoner Names to Riot IDs. Your name will now be shared across all of Riot's games.
snrd_transition_modal_body_postLaunch: League of Legends has transitioned from using Summoner Names to Riot IDs. Your name is now shared across all of Riot’s games.
rp_top_up_error_message: An unexpected error occured. Please go to the store to buy more RP. Error Code: {{errorCode}}.
loot_odds_error_fail_to_load_description: Sorry, we were unable to retrieve loot item data. If this persists, please try restarting the League Client.
loot_odds_droprates_modal_legal_disclaim: Information about the probabilities relating to the content of your purchase
loot_odds_droprates_modal_additional_gua: Also contains one of the following:
loot_odds_droprates_modal_chance_subtitl: Chance to contain any of the following:
loot_odds_bad_luck_protection_descriptio: No bad luck for you. For certain rewards, opening a certain number of items without a specific reward will guarantee that reward on the next item. The reward and threshold are different for every item.
loot_odds_no_duplicates_description: One or more rewards will not drop an item you already own. Can drop an item one level higher if the item has tiers. All unowned items have a higher chance to drop.
loot_sanctum_eat_description: The Sanctum is home to Exalted Skins, Mythic Essence, and other premium content, now located in the Loot Tab.
vanguard_is_coming_modal_explanation: Riot's anti-cheat software Vanguard will be supporting League to protect players and the competitive integrity of our games. To prepare you for this important update, we will run a quick diagnostics test:
vanguard_is_coming_modal_check_pass: YOUR SYSTEM IS GOOD TO GO FOR THE VANGUARD UPDATE!
vanguard_is_coming_modal_check_fail: YOUR SYSTEM DIDN'T PASS THE CHECK, HERE'S WHAT YOU CAN DO NEXT:
vanguard_is_coming_modal_action_ticket: Open a ticket with our Player Support Team
vanguard_is_coming_modal_action_faq: Troubleshoot using our Vanguard FAQ page.
vanguard_is_coming_modal_manual_check: You can run this system check manually from the settings menu in the General Tab
vanguard_game_ended_early_description: A cheater was detected in your last game. No win or loss was credited to any player.
vanguard_error_description: An unexpected error with Vanguard has occured and the client will now close.
vanguard_error_description_hardware:
A review detected that actions of an account playing on this device violated our rules on third party tools and/or the User Rules (Section 7) of our Terms of Service. This device is now restricted from access.

Fair play and respecting the integrity of a match are essential to be a team that wins together. We encourage you to reflect on your behavior to be a respectful teammate in future games. You can visit our FAQ to learn more, including your right to appeal.
vanguard_error_description_persist: If this error persists, try the following steps:
champion_mastery_EAT_description: Play games to level up your Champion Mastery!
dx9_deprecation_modal_upgrade_hardware: League & Teamfight Tactics are moving to DirectX 11 soon, which your computer does not support. Please upgrade to continue enjoying League. More info
dx9_deprecation_modal_turn_off_dx9_legac: You are using DirectX 9 (DX9) Legacy Mode, which will be disabled soon. Please change this in your graphics settings after the game. You can reach out to player support if you have additional questions.
dx9_deprecation_cannot_play_game: League & Teamfight Tactics have moved to DirectX 11, which your computer does not support. Please upgrade to continue playing. More info
dx11_upgrade_hardware: League is updating its DirectX usage soon. Your graphics card does not support DirectX feature level 11_0. You will need to upgrade your hardware so that you can continue playing after this upgrade.
mac_graphics_upgrade_modal_upgrade_hardw: League is moving from OpenGL to Metal graphics soon, which your Mac does not support. Please use a device that supports Metal to continue playing League of Legends and Teamfight Tactics. You can reach out to player support if you have additional questions.
mac_graphics_upgrade_modal_turn_off_lega: You are using OpenGL Legacy Mode, which will be disabled soon. Please change this in your graphics settings after the game. You can reach out to player support if you have additional questions.
mac_graphics_upgrade_modal_gradual_rollo: Sometime in the next few patches, we will move macOS users from an OpenGL graphics technology to Metal graphics. This will roll out gradually with the ability to revert back to OpenGL for a period of time until OpenGL is removed.
mac_graphics_upgrade_modal_switch_settin: If you need to switch from OpenGL to Metal, or Metal to OpenGL:
Open Client settings by clicking the "{{gearIcon}}" in the upper-right hand corner of the League Client.
For the "Graphics Technology" combo box, change its selection to either "Metal" or "OpenGL", as you prefer.
Select "Done" from the bottom of the modal.
mac_graphics_upgrade_modal_reach_out_to_: You can reach out to player support if you have additional questions.
mac_graphics_upgrade_cannot_play_game: League requires a version of Metal graphics that your Mac does not support. Please use a device that supports more current Metal graphics versions to continue playing.
